00023 /*
00024 
00025  Please be careful when changing this file. It's the result of roughly
00026  78 hours of work, where approximately 14 liters of coffee where consumed,
00027  the keyboard been replaced 4 times due to worn-out cut'n'paste combo keys
00028  and two ambulance calls because of near-fatal RSI syndroms. Every line has
00029  been thought of carefully and has been highly optimized by 3 members of a
00030  Zen buddhist religion in a Tibetian monastry. Thus modifications, as they
00031  touch the core OpenGL support, could severely affect performance. Beware!
00032  Okay, maybe this was a bit exagerated... this file is autogenerated.
00033  
00034  */
00035 
00040 #ifndef __CS_GLEXTENSIONMANAGER_H__
00041 #define __CS_GLEXTENSIONMANAGER_H__
00042 
00043 /**********************************************************************
00044  * Begin system-specific stuff.
00045  */
00046 #if defined(__BEOS__)
00047 #include <stdlib.h>     /* to get some BeOS-isms */
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 #if !defined(OPENSTEP) && (defined(NeXT) || defined(NeXT_PDO))
00051 #define OPENSTEP
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__WIN32__) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00055 #define __WIN32__
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 #if !defined(GLAPI)
00059 #  if !defined(OPENSTEP) && (defined(__WIN32__) && !defined(__CYGWIN__))
00060 #    if defined(_MSC_VER) && defined(BUILD_GL32) /* tag specify we're building mesa as a DLL */
00061 #      define GLAPI __declspec(dllexport)
00062 #    elif defined(_MSC_VER) && defined(_DLL) /* tag specifying we're building for DLL runtime support */
00063 #      define GLAPI __declspec(dllimport)
00064 #    else /* for use with static link lib build of Win32 edition only */
00065 #      define GLAPI extern
00066 #    endif /* _STATIC_MESA support */
00067 #    define GLAPIENTRY __stdcall
00068 #  else
00069 /* non-Windows compilation */
00070 /* In most cases, it seems safest to avoid defining these at all. Please report
00071  *  if this causes trouble.
00072  * #define GLAPI extern
00073  * #define GLAPI
00074  * #define GLAPIENTRY
00075  */
00076 #  endif /* WIN32 / CYGWIN bracket */
00077 #endif
00078 
00079 //#if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(_WINGDI_) && !defined(__CYGWIN__) && !defined(_GNU_H_WINDOWS32_DEFINES) && !defined(OPENSTEP)
00080 //#include <gl/mesa_wgl.h>
00081 //#endif
00082 
00083 #if defined(macintosh) && PRAGMA_IMPORT_SUPPORTED
00084 #pragma import on
00085 #endif
00086 
00087 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(APIENTRY) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00088 #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN 1
00089 #include <windows.h>
00090 #endif
00091 
00092 #ifndef csAPIENTRY
00093 #ifndef APIENTRY
00094 #define csAPIENTRY
00095 #else
00096 #define csAPIENTRY APIENTRY
00097 #endif
00098 #endif
00099 
00100 // In CS, we ignore Cygwin's graphical offerings and use the Windows versions.
00101 #if defined(__CYGWIN__) && !defined(_WIN32)
00102 #define _WIN32
00103 #endif
00104 
00105 /*
00106  * End system-specific stuff.
00107  **********************************************************************/
00108 
00109 #ifdef DOXYGEN_RUN
00110 typedef void GLvoid;
00111 typedef int GLint;
00112 typedef uint GLuint;
00113 typedef int GLsizei;
00114 typedef enum GLenum;
00115 typedef float GLfloat;
00116 typedef double GLdouble;
00117 typedef unsigned char GLubyte;
00118 #  define _WIN32
00119 #else
00120 #  if defined(CS_OPENGL_PATH)
00121 #    include CS_HEADER_GLOBAL(CS_OPENGL_PATH,gl.h)
00122 #  else
00123 #    include <GL/gl.h>
00124 #  endif
00125 #endif

00721 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLACTIVETEXTURE) (GLenum texture);

00724 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1DV) (GLenum target, const GLdouble* v);
00725 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1F) (GLenum target, GLfloat s);
00726 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1FV) (GLenum target, const GLfloat* v);

00728 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1IV) (GLenum target, const GLint* v);
00729 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1S) (GLenum target, GLshort s);

01096 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLCONVOLUTIONFILTER2D) (GLenum target, GLenum internalformat, GLsizei width, GLsizei height, GLenum format, GLenum type, const GLvoid* image);

01102 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLCOPYCONVOLUTIONFILTER2D) (GLenum target, GLenum internalformat, GLint x, GLint y, GLsizei width, GLsizei height);

01274 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1DVARB) (GLenum target, const GLdouble* v);
01275 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLMULTITEXCOORD1FARB) (GLenum target, GLfloat s);

02009 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLWEIGHTBVARB) (GLint size, GLbyte* weights);
02010 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLWEIGHTSVARB) (GLint size, GLshort* weights);
02011 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLWEIGHTIVARB) (GLint size, GLint* weights);
02012 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLWEIGHTFVARB) (GLint size, GLfloat* weights);
02013 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLWEIGHTDVARB) (GLint size, GLdouble* weights);
02014 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLWEIGHTVARB) (GLint size, GLdouble* weights);

02016 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLWEIGHTUSVARB) (GLint size, GLushort* weights);

04829 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLCOMBINERINPUTNV) (GLenum stage, GLenum portion, GLenum variable, GLenum input, GLenum mapping, GLenum componentUsage);
04830 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLCOMBINEROUTPUTNV) (GLenum stage, GLenum portion, GLenum abOutput, GLenum cdOutput, GLenum sumOutput, GLenum scale, GLenum bias, GLboolean abDotProduct, GLboolean cdDotProduct, GLboolean muxSum);

09675 typedef GLboolean (csAPIENTRY* csGLISRENDERBUFFEREXT) (GLuint renderbuffer);
09676 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLBINDRENDERBUFFEREXT) (GLenum target, GLuint renderbuffer);
09677 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLDELETERENDERBUFFERSEXT) (GLsizei n, const GLuint* renderbuffers);
09678 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGENRENDERBUFFERSEXT) (GLsizei n, GLuint* renderbuffers);
09679 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLRENDERBUFFERSTORAGEEXT) (GLenum target, GLenum internalformat, GLsizei width, GLsizei height);
09680 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETRENDERBUFFERPARAMETERIVEXT) (GLenum target, GLenum pname, GLint* params);
09681 typedef GLboolean (csAPIENTRY* csGLISFRAMEBUFFEREXT) (GLuint framebuffer);
09682 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLBINDFRAMEBUFFEREXT) (GLenum target, GLuint framebuffer);
09683 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLDELETEFRAMEBUFFERSEXT) (GLsizei n, const GLuint* framebuffers);
09684 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGENFRAMEBUFFERSEXT) (GLsizei n, GLuint* framebuffers);
09685 typedef GLenum (csAPIENTRY* csGLCHECKFRAMEBUFFERSTATUSEXT) (GLenum target);
09686 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLFRAMEBUFFERTEXTURE1DEXT) (GLenum target, GLenum attachment, GLenum textarget, GLuint texture, GLint level);
09687 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLFRAMEBUFFERTEXTURE2DEXT) (GLenum target, GLenum attachment, GLenum textarget, GLuint texture, GLint level);
09688 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLFRAMEBUFFERTEXTURE3DEXT) (GLenum target, GLenum attachment, GLenum textarget, GLuint texture, GLint level, GLint zoffset);
09689 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLFRAMEBUFFERRENDERBUFFEREXT) (GLenum target, GLenum attachment, GLenum renderbuffertarget, GLuint renderbuffer);
09690 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGETFRAMEBUFFERATTACHMENTPARAMETERIVEXT) (GLenum target, GLenum attachment, GLenum pname, GLint* params);
09691 typedef GLvoid (csAPIENTRY* csGLGENERATEMIPMAPEXT) (GLenum target);

09698 #define GL_PIXEL_PACK_BUFFER_EXT                                     0x88EB
09699 #endif

09701 #ifndef GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER_EXT
09702 #define GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER_EXT                                   0x88EC
09703 #endif
09704 
09705 #ifndef GL_PIXEL_PACK_BUFFER_BINDING_EXT
09706 #define GL_PIXEL_PACK_BUFFER_BINDING_EXT                             0x88ED
09707 #endif
09708 
09709 #ifndef GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER_BINDING_EXT
09710 #define GL_PIXEL_UNPACK_BUFFER_BINDING_EXT                           0x88EF
09711 #endif
09712 
09713 
09723 // end of definitions
09724 
09725 #ifdef CS_DEBUG
09726 #  define REPORT_MISSING_ENTRIES true
09727 #else
09728 #  define REPORT_MISSING_ENTRIES false
09729 #endif
09730 
09731 #define EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(nameNC, nameUC) \
09732       funcTest = ((nameNC = (cs##nameUC) gl->GetProcAddress (#nameNC)) != 0); \
09733       if (!funcTest && config->GetBool ("Video.OpenGL.ReportMissingEntries", \
09734         REPORT_MISSING_ENTRIES)) \
09735       { \
09736         Report (msgExtRetrieveFail, #nameNC); \
09737       } \
09738       allclear &= funcTest; \
09739 
09740 #define EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT(exttype, nameNC) \
09741       if (CS_##nameNC = allclear) \
09742       { \
09743         CS_##nameNC &= config->GetBool (cfgkey, true); \
09744         if (CS_##nameNC) \
09745         { \
09746           Report (msgExtFoundAndUsed, exttype, ext); \
09747         } \
09748         else \
09749         { \
09750           Report (msgExtFoundAndNotUsed, exttype, ext); \
09751         } \
09752       } \
09753       else \
09754       { \
09755         Report (msgExtInitFail, exttype, ext); \
09756       }

14582 };
14583

15187   bool tested_CS_GL_SGI_color_matrix;
15188   bool tested_CS_GL_SGI_color_table;
15189   bool tested_CS_GL_SGI_texture_color_table;
15190   bool tested_CS_GL_SUN_vertex;
15191   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_fragment_program;
15192   bool tested_CS_GL_ATI_text_fragment_shader;
15193   bool tested_CS_GL_APPLE_client_storage;
15194   bool tested_CS_GL_APPLE_element_array;
15195   bool tested_CS_GL_APPLE_fence;
15196   bool tested_CS_GL_APPLE_vertex_array_object;
15197   bool tested_CS_GL_APPLE_vertex_array_range;
15198   bool tested_CS_WGL_ARB_pixel_format;
15199   bool tested_CS_WGL_ARB_make_current_read;
15200   bool tested_CS_WGL_ARB_pbuffer;
15201   bool tested_CS_WGL_EXT_swap_control;
15202   bool tested_CS_WGL_ARB_render_texture;
15203   bool tested_CS_WGL_EXT_extensions_string;
15204   bool tested_CS_WGL_EXT_make_current_read;
15205   bool tested_CS_WGL_EXT_pbuffer;
15206   bool tested_CS_WGL_EXT_pixel_format;
15207   bool tested_CS_WGL_I3D_digital_video_control;
15208   bool tested_CS_WGL_I3D_gamma;
15209   bool tested_CS_WGL_I3D_genlock;
15210   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_matrix_palette;
15211   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_element_array;
15212   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_float_buffer;
15213   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_fragment_program;
15214   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_primitive_restart;
15215   bool tested_CS_GL_NV_vertex_program2;
15216   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_vertex_buffer_object;
15217   bool tested_CS_GL_ATI_separate_stencil;
15218   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_texture_non_power_of_two;
15219   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_point_sprite;
15220   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_shading_language_100;
15221   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_shader_objects;
15222   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_fragment_shader;
15223   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_vertex_shader;
15224   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object;
15225   bool tested_CS_GL_ARB_texture_rectangle;
15226   bool tested_CS_GL_EXT_framebuffer_object;
15227   bool tested_CS_GL_EXT_pixel_buffer_object;
15228 
15229 };
15230 
15235 struct csGLExtensionManager : public csGLExtensionFunctions,
15236                               public csGLExtensionFlags
15237 {
15238 private:
15239   iObjectRegistry* object_reg;
15240   csConfigAccess config;
15241   iOpenGLInterface* gl;
15242   
15243   const char* extstrGL;
15244   const char* msgExtRetrieveFail;
15245   const char* msgExtFoundAndUsed;
15246   const char* msgExtFoundAndNotUsed;
15247   const char* msgExtInitFail;
15248   const char* msgExtNotFound;
15249   const char* msgDependencyNotFound;
15250 #ifdef __WIN32__
15251   const char* extstrWGL;
15252   
15253   void SetupWGLextStr (HDC hDC)
15254   {
15255     if (extstrWGL != 0) return;
15256   
15257     if (!tested_CS_WGL_ARB_extensions_string) InitWGL_ARB_extensions_string (hDC);
15258     if (CS_WGL_ARB_extensions_string)
15259     {
15260       extstrWGL = wglGetExtensionsStringARB (hDC);
15261     }
15262     else
15263     {
15264       extstrWGL = extstrGL;
15265     }
15266   }
15267 #endif
15268 
15269   void Report (const char* msg, ...)
15270   {
15271     csRef<iVerbosityManager> verbosemgr (
15272       CS_QUERY_REGISTRY (object_reg, iVerbosityManager));
15273     
15274     if (!verbosemgr->CheckFlag ("renderer"))
15275       return;
15276     
15277     va_list arg;
15278     va_start (arg, msg);
15279     csRef<iReporter> rep (CS_QUERY_REGISTRY (object_reg, iReporter));
15280     if (rep)
15281       rep->ReportV (CS_REPORTER_SEVERITY_NOTIFY,
15282          "crystalspace.canvas.opengl.extmgr", msg, arg);
15283     else
15284     {
15285       csPrintfV (msg, arg);
15286       csPrintf ("\n");
15287     }
15288     va_end (arg);
15289   }
15290 
15291 public:
15292   void Initialize (iObjectRegistry* object_reg, iGraphics2D* g2d)
15293   {
15294     csGLExtensionManager::object_reg = object_reg;
15295     gl = csRef<iOpenGLInterface>
15296       (SCF_QUERY_INTERFACE (g2d, iOpenGLInterface));
15297     // Low priority so canvas/renderer cfgs may override the settings
15298     config.AddConfig (object_reg, "/config/glext.cfg", true,
15299       iConfigManager::ConfigPriorityPlugin - 1);
15300   }
15301   
15302   void Open () 
15303   { 
15304     extstrGL = (const char*)glGetString (GL_EXTENSIONS);
15305   }
15306   
15307   void Close () { }
15308 public:
15309   void Reset ()
15310   {
15311     extstrGL = 0;
15312 #ifdef __WIN32__
15313     extstrWGL = 0;
15314 #endif
15315 
15316     memset ((csGLExtensionFunctions*)this, 0, 
15317       sizeof (csGLExtensionFunctions));
15318     memset ((csGLExtensionFlags*)this, 0, sizeof (csGLExtensionFlags));
15319   }
15320   
15321   csGLExtensionManager () : object_reg (0), gl (0)
15322   {
15323     msgExtRetrieveFail = "Failed to retrieve %s";
15324     msgExtFoundAndUsed = "%s Extension '%s' found and used.";
15325     msgExtFoundAndNotUsed = "%s Extension '%s' found, but not used.";
15326     msgExtInitFail = "%s Extension '%s' failed to initialize.";
15327     msgExtNotFound = "%s Extension '%s' not found.";
15328     msgDependencyNotFound = "%s Extension '%s' depends on '%s' which did "
15329       "not initialize.";
15330     
15331     Reset ();
15332   }
15333   
15335   void InitGL_version_1_2 ()
15336   {
15337     if (tested_CS_GL_version_1_2) return;
15338     if (!extstrGL) return;
15339     tested_CS_GL_version_1_2 = true;
15340     const char* ext = "GL_version_1_2";
15341 
15342     char cfgkey[26 + 14 + 1];
15343     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
15344     
15345     CS_GL_version_1_2 = true;
15346 
15347     bool allclear, funcTest;
15348     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
15349     bool init = CS_GL_version_1_2;
15350     allclear = true;
15351     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
15352     {
15353       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glDrawRangeElements, GLDRAWRANGEELEMENTS);
15354       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexImage3D, GLTEXIMAGE3D);
15355       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexSubImage3D, GLTEXSUBIMAGE3D);
15356       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCopyTexSubImage3D, GLCOPYTEXSUBIMAGE3D);
15357 
15358       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_version_1_2)
15359     }
15360     else
15361     {
15362       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
15363     }
15364   }
15365   
15367   void InitGL_version_1_3 ()
15368   {
15369     if (tested_CS_GL_version_1_3) return;
15370     if (!extstrGL) return;
15371     tested_CS_GL_version_1_3 = true;
15372     const char* ext = "GL_version_1_3";
15373 
15374     char cfgkey[26 + 14 + 1];
15375     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
15376     
15377     CS_GL_version_1_3 = true;
15378 
15379     bool allclear, funcTest;
15380     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
15381     bool init = CS_GL_version_1_3;
15382     allclear = true;
15383     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
15384     {
15385       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glActiveTexture, GLACTIVETEXTURE);
15386       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glClientActiveTexture, GLCLIENTACTIVETEXTURE);
15387       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1d, GLMULTITEXCOORD1D);
15388       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1dv, GLMULTITEXCOORD1DV);
15389       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1f, GLMULTITEXCOORD1F);
15390       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1fv, GLMULTITEXCOORD1FV);
15391       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1i, GLMULTITEXCOORD1I);
15392       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1iv, GLMULTITEXCOORD1IV);
15393       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1s, GLMULTITEXCOORD1S);
15394       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1sv, GLMULTITEXCOORD1SV);
15395       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2d, GLMULTITEXCOORD2D);
15396       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2dv, GLMULTITEXCOORD2DV);
15397       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2f, GLMULTITEXCOORD2F);
15398       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2fv, GLMULTITEXCOORD2FV);
15399       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2i, GLMULTITEXCOORD2I);
15400       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2iv, GLMULTITEXCOORD2IV);
15401       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2s, GLMULTITEXCOORD2S);
15402       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2sv, GLMULTITEXCOORD2SV);
15403       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3d, GLMULTITEXCOORD3D);
15404       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3dv, GLMULTITEXCOORD3DV);
15405       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3f, GLMULTITEXCOORD3F);
15406       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3fv, GLMULTITEXCOORD3FV);
15407       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3i, GLMULTITEXCOORD3I);
15408       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3iv, GLMULTITEXCOORD3IV);
15409       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3s, GLMULTITEXCOORD3S);
15410       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3sv, GLMULTITEXCOORD3SV);
15411       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4d, GLMULTITEXCOORD4D);
15412       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4dv, GLMULTITEXCOORD4DV);
15413       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4f, GLMULTITEXCOORD4F);
15414       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4fv, GLMULTITEXCOORD4FV);
15415       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4i, GLMULTITEXCOORD4I);
15416       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4iv, GLMULTITEXCOORD4IV);
15417       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4s, GLMULTITEXCOORD4S);
15418       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4sv, GLMULTITEXCOORD4SV);
15419       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glLoadTransposeMatrixf, GLLOADTRANSPOSEMATRIXF);
15420       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glLoadTransposeMatrixd, GLLOADTRANSPOSEMATRIXD);
15421       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultTransposeMatrixf, GLMULTTRANSPOSEMATRIXF);
15422       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultTransposeMatrixd, GLMULTTRANSPOSEMATRIXD);
15423       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glSampleCoverage, GLSAMPLECOVERAGE);
15424       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexImage3D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXIMAGE3D);
15425       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexImage2D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXIMAGE2D);
15426       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexImage1D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXIMAGE1D);
15427       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexSubImage3D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXSUBIMAGE3D);
15428       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexSubImage2D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXSUBIMAGE2D);
15429       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompressedTexSubImage1D, GLCOMPRESSEDTEXSUBIMAGE1D);
15430       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetCompressedTexImage, GLGETCOMPRESSEDTEXIMAGE);
15431 
15432       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_version_1_3)
15433     }
15434     else
15435     {
15436       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
15437     }
15438   }
15439   
15442   void InitGL_ARB_imaging ()
15443   {
15444     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_imaging) return;
15445     if (!extstrGL) return;
15446     tested_CS_GL_ARB_imaging = true;
15447     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_imaging";
15448 
15449     char cfgkey[26 + 14 + 1];
15450     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
15451     
15452     CS_GL_ARB_imaging = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
15453 
15454     bool allclear, funcTest;
15455     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
15456     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_imaging;
15457     allclear = true;
15458     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
15459     {
15460       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColorTable, GLCOLORTABLE);
15461       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColorTableParameterfv, GLCOLORTABLEPARAMETERFV);
15462       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColorTableParameteriv, GLCOLORTABLEPARAMETERIV);
15463       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCopyColorTable, GLCOPYCOLORTABLE);
15464       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetColorTable, GLGETCOLORTABLE);
15465       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetColorTableParameterfv, GLGETCOLORTABLEPARAMETERFV);
15466       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetColorTableParameteriv, GLGETCOLORTABLEPARAMETERIV);
15467       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColorSubTable, GLCOLORSUBTABLE);
15468       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCopyColorSubTable, GLCOPYCOLORSUBTABLE);
15469       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionFilter1D, GLCONVOLUTIONFILTER1D);
15470       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionFilter2D, GLCONVOLUTIONFILTER2D);
15471       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionParameterf, GLCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERF);
15472       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionParameterfv, GLCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERFV);
15473       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionParameteri, GLCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERI);
15474       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glConvolutionParameteriv, GLCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERIV);
15475       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCopyConvolutionFilter1D, GLCOPYCONVOLUTIONFILTER1D);
15476       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCopyConvolutionFilter2D, GLCOPYCONVOLUTIONFILTER2D);
15477       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetConvolutionFilter, GLGETCONVOLUTIONFILTER);
15478       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetConvolutionParameterfv, GLGETCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERFV);
15479       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetConvolutionParameteriv, GLGETCONVOLUTIONPARAMETERIV);
15480       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetSeparableFilter, GLGETSEPARABLEFILTER);
15481       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glSeparableFilter2D, GLSEPARABLEFILTER2D);
15482       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetHistogram, GLGETHISTOGRAM);
15483       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetHistogramParameterfv, GLGETHISTOGRAMPARAMETERFV);
15484       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetHistogramParameteriv, GLGETHISTOGRAMPARAMETERIV);
15485       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetMinmax, GLGETMINMAX);
15486       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetMinmaxParameterfv, GLGETMINMAXPARAMETERFV);
15487       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetMinmaxParameteriv, GLGETMINMAXPARAMETERIV);
15488       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glHistogram, GLHISTOGRAM);
15489       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMinmax, GLMINMAX);
15490       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glResetHistogram, GLRESETHISTOGRAM);
15491       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glResetMinmax, GLRESETMINMAX);
15492       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBlendColor, GLBLENDCOLOR);
15493       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBlendEquation, GLBLENDEQUATION);
15494 
15495       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_imaging)
15496     }
15497     else
15498     {
15499       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
15500     }
15501   }
15502   
15505   void InitGL_ARB_multitexture ()
15506   {
15507     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_multitexture) return;
15508     if (!extstrGL) return;
15509     tested_CS_GL_ARB_multitexture = true;
15510     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_multitexture";
15511 
15512     char cfgkey[26 + 19 + 1];
15513     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
15514     
15515     CS_GL_ARB_multitexture = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
15516 
15517     bool allclear, funcTest;
15518     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
15519     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_multitexture;
15520     allclear = true;
15521     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
15522     {
15523       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glActiveTextureARB, GLACTIVETEXTUREARB);
15524       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glClientActiveTextureARB, GLCLIENTACTIVETEXTUREARB);

15526       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1dvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1DVARB);
15527       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1fARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1FARB);
15528       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1fvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1FVARB);
15529       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1iARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1IARB);
15530       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1ivARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1IVARB);
15531       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1sARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1SARB);
15532       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord1svARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD1SVARB);
15533       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2dARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2DARB);
15534       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2dvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2DVARB);
15535       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2fARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2FARB);
15536       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2fvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2FVARB);
15537       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2iARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2IARB);
15538       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2ivARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2IVARB);
15539       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2sARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2SARB);
15540       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord2svARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD2SVARB);
15541       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3dARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3DARB);
15542       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3dvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3DVARB);
15543       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3fARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3FARB);
15544       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3fvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3FVARB);
15545       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3iARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3IARB);
15546       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3ivARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3IVARB);
15547       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3sARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3SARB);
15548       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord3svARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD3SVARB);
15549       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4dARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4DARB);
15550       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4dvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4DVARB);
15551       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4fARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4FARB);
15552       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4fvARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4FVARB);
15553       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4iARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4IARB);
15554       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4ivARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4IVARB);
15555       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4sARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4SARB);
15556       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultiTexCoord4svARB, GLMULTITEXCOORD4SVARB);
15557 
15558       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_multitexture)
15559     }
15560     else
15561     {
15562       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
15563     }
15564   }

15568   void InitGL_ARB_transpose_matrix ()
15569   {
15570     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_transpose_matrix) return;
15571     if (!extstrGL) return;
15572     tested_CS_GL_ARB_transpose_matrix = true;
15573     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_transpose_matrix";
15574 
15575     char cfgkey[26 + 23 + 1];
15576     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
15577     
15578     CS_GL_ARB_transpose_matrix = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
15579 
15580     bool allclear, funcTest;
15581     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
15582     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_transpose_matrix;
15583     allclear = true;
15584     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
15585     {
15586       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glLoadTransposeMatrixfARB, GLLOADTRANSPOSEMATRIXFARB);
15587       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glLoadTransposeMatrixdARB, GLLOADTRANSPOSEMATRIXDARB);
15588       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultTransposeMatrixfARB, GLMULTTRANSPOSEMATRIXFARB);
15589       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glMultTransposeMatrixdARB, GLMULTTRANSPOSEMATRIXDARB);
15590 
15591       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_transpose_matrix)
15592     }
15593     else
15594     {
15595       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
15596     }
15597   }

15632   {

15634     if (!extstrGL) return;
15635     tested_CS_GL_ARB_texture_env_add = true;

15639     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
15640     
15641     CS_GL_ARB_texture_env_add = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
15642 
15643     bool allclear, funcTest;
15644     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
15645     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_texture_env_add;
15646     allclear = true;
15647     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
15648     {
15649 
15650       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_texture_env_add)
15651     }
15652     else
15653     {
15654       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
15655     }
15656   }
15657   
15658 #ifdef _WIN32
15659 
15661   void InitWGL_ARB_extensions_string (HDC hDC)
15662   {
15663     if (tested_CS_WGL_ARB_extensions_string) return;
15664     tested_CS_WGL_ARB_extensions_string = true;
15665     const char* ext = "WGL_ARB_extensions_string";
15666     char cfgkey[26 + 25 + 1];
15667     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
15668     
15669     CS_WGL_ARB_extensions_string = true;
15670 
15671     bool allclear, funcTest;
15672     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
15673     bool init = CS_WGL_ARB_extensions_string;
15674     allclear = true;
15675     if (init)
15676     {
15677       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(wglGetExtensionsStringARB, WGLGETEXTENSIONSSTRINGARB);
15678 
15679       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("WGL", WGL_ARB_extensions_string)
15680       CS_WGL_ARB_extensions_string &= allclear;
15681     }
15682     else
15683     {
15684       Report (msgExtNotFound, "WGL", ext);
15685     }
15686   }
15687 #endif
15688

15693   {

15695     tested_CS_WGL_ARB_buffer_region = true;

15701     if (!extstrWGL) return;
15702     CS_WGL_ARB_buffer_region = (strstr (extstrWGL, ext) != 0);
15703 
15704     bool allclear, funcTest;
15705     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
15706     bool init = CS_WGL_ARB_buffer_region;
15707     allclear = true;
15708     if (init)
15709     {

16157       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramEnvParameter4dvARB, GLPROGRAMENVPARAMETER4DVARB);

16161       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramLocalParameter4dvARB, GLPROGRAMLOCALPARAMETER4DVARB);
16162       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramLocalParameter4fARB, GLPROGRAMLOCALPARAMETER4FARB);
16163       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glProgramLocalParameter4fvARB, GLPROGRAMLOCALPARAMETER4FVARB);
16164       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetProgramEnvParameterdvARB, GLGETPROGRAMENVPARAMETERDVARB);
16165       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetProgramEnvParameterfvARB, GLGETPROGRAMENVPARAMETERFVARB);
16166       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetProgramLocalParameterdvARB, GLGETPROGRAMLOCALPARAMETERDVARB);
16167       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetProgramLocalParameterfvARB, GLGETPROGRAMLOCALPARAMETERFVARB);
16168       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetProgramivARB, GLGETPROGRAMIVARB);
16169       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetProgramStringARB, GLGETPROGRAMSTRINGARB);
16170       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVertexAttribdvARB, GLGETVERTEXATTRIBDVARB);
16171       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVertexAttribfvARB, GLGETVERTEXATTRIBFVARB);
16172       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVertexAttribivARB, GLGETVERTEXATTRIBIVARB);
16173       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVertexAttribPointervARB, GLGETVERTEXATTRIBPOINTERVARB);
16174       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glIsProgramARB, GLISPROGRAMARB);
16175 
16176       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_vertex_program)
16177     }
16178     else
16179     {
16180       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
16181     }
16182   }
16183   
16186   void InitGL_ARB_window_pos ()
16187   {
16188     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_window_pos) return;
16189     if (!extstrGL) return;
16190     tested_CS_GL_ARB_window_pos = true;
16191     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_window_pos";
16192 
16193     char cfgkey[26 + 17 + 1];
16194     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
16195     
16196     CS_GL_ARB_window_pos = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
16197 
16198     bool allclear, funcTest;
16199     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
16200     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_window_pos;
16201     allclear = true;
16202     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
16203     {
16204       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos2dARB, GLWINDOWPOS2DARB);
16205       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos2fARB, GLWINDOWPOS2FARB);

16208       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos2dvARB, GLWINDOWPOS2DVARB);
16209       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos2fvARB, GLWINDOWPOS2FVARB);
16210       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos2ivARB, GLWINDOWPOS2IVARB);
16211       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos2svARB, GLWINDOWPOS2SVARB);
16212       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos3dARB, GLWINDOWPOS3DARB);
16213       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos3fARB, GLWINDOWPOS3FARB);
16214       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos3iARB, GLWINDOWPOS3IARB);
16215       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos3sARB, GLWINDOWPOS3SARB);
16216       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos3dvARB, GLWINDOWPOS3DVARB);
16217       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos3fvARB, GLWINDOWPOS3FVARB);
16218       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glWindowPos3ivARB, GLWINDOWPOS3IVARB);

16780     bool init = CS_GL_EXT_point_parameters;
16781     allclear = true;
16782     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
16783     {
16784       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glPointParameterfEXT, GLPOINTPARAMETERFEXT);
16785       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glPointParameterfvEXT, GLPOINTPARAMETERFVEXT);
16786 
16787       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_EXT_point_parameters)
16788     }
16789     else
16790     {
16791       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
16792     }
16793   }

17366       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glVariantubvEXT, GLVARIANTUBVEXT);
17367       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glVariantusvEXT, GLVARIANTUSVEXT);
17368       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glVariantuivEXT, GLVARIANTUIVEXT);

17370       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glEnableVariantClientStateEXT, GLENABLEVARIANTCLIENTSTATEEXT);
17371       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glDisableVariantClientStateEXT, GLDISABLEVARIANTCLIENTSTATEEXT);
17372       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBindLightParameterEXT, GLBINDLIGHTPARAMETEREXT);
17373       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBindMaterialParameterEXT, GLBINDMATERIALPARAMETEREXT);
17374       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBindTexGenParameterEXT, GLBINDTEXGENPARAMETEREXT);
17375       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBindTextureUnitParameterEXT, GLBINDTEXTUREUNITPARAMETEREXT);
17376       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBindParameterEXT, GLBINDPARAMETEREXT);
17377       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glIsVariantEnabledEXT, GLISVARIANTENABLEDEXT);
17378       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVariantBooleanvEXT, GLGETVARIANTBOOLEANVEXT);
17379       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVariantIntegervEXT, GLGETVARIANTINTEGERVEXT);
17380       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVariantFloatvEXT, GLGETVARIANTFLOATVEXT);
17381       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVariantPointervEXT, GLGETVARIANTPOINTERVEXT);

17943     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
17944     
17945     CS_GL_NV_texture_compression_vtc = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
17946 
17947     bool allclear, funcTest;
17948     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
17949     bool init = CS_GL_NV_texture_compression_vtc;
17950     allclear = true;
17951     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
17952     {
17953 
17954       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_NV_texture_compression_vtc)
17955     }
17956     else

17959     }

18471     bool allclear, funcTest;
18472     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
18473     bool init = CS_GL_ATI_vertex_array_object;
18474     allclear = true;
18475     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
18476     {
18477       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glNewObjectBufferATI, GLNEWOBJECTBUFFERATI);
18478       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glIsObjectBufferATI, GLISOBJECTBUFFERATI);
18479       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUpdateObjectBufferATI, GLUPDATEOBJECTBUFFERATI);
18480       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetObjectBufferfvATI, GLGETOBJECTBUFFERFVATI);
18481       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetObjectBufferivATI, GLGETOBJECTBUFFERIVATI);
18482       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glFreeObjectBufferATI, GLFREEOBJECTBUFFERATI);
18483       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glArrayObjectATI, GLARRAYOBJECTATI);
18484       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetArrayObjectfvATI, GLGETARRAYOBJECTFVATI);
18485       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetArrayObjectivATI, GLGETARRAYOBJECTIVATI);
18486       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glVariantArrayObjectATI, GLVARIANTARRAYOBJECTATI);
18487       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVariantArrayObjectfvATI, GLGETVARIANTARRAYOBJECTFVATI);
18488       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetVariantArrayObjectivATI, GLGETVARIANTARRAYOBJECTIVATI);
18489 
18490       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ATI_vertex_array_object)
18491     }
18492     else
18493     {

18495     }
18496   }

18980   void InitGL_OML_interlace ()
18981   {
18982     if (tested_CS_GL_OML_interlace) return;
18983     if (!extstrGL) return;
18984     tested_CS_GL_OML_interlace = true;
18985     const char* ext = "GL_OML_interlace";
18986 
18987     char cfgkey[26 + 16 + 1];
18988     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
18989     
18990     CS_GL_OML_interlace = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
18991 
18992     bool allclear, funcTest;
18993     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
18994     bool init = CS_GL_OML_interlace;
18995     allclear = true;
18996     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
18997     {
18998 
18999       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_OML_interlace)
19000     }
19001     else
19002     {
19003       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
19004     }

19487   void InitGL_SUN_vertex ()
19488   {

19490     if (!extstrGL) return;
19491     tested_CS_GL_SUN_vertex = true;
19492     const char* ext = "GL_SUN_vertex";
19493 
19494     char cfgkey[26 + 13 + 1];
19495     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
19496     
19497     CS_GL_SUN_vertex = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
19498 
19499     bool allclear, funcTest;
19500     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
19501     bool init = CS_GL_SUN_vertex;
19502     allclear = true;
19503     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
19504     {
19505       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColor4ubVertex2fSUN, GLCOLOR4UBVERTEX2FSUN);
19506       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColor4ubVertex2fvSUN, GLCOLOR4UBVERTEX2FVSUN);
19507       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColor4ubVertex3fSUN, GLCOLOR4UBVERTEX3FSUN);
19508       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColor4ubVertex3fvSUN, GLCOLOR4UBVERTEX3FVSUN);
19509       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColor3fVertex3fSUN, GLCOLOR3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19510       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColor3fVertex3fvSUN, GLCOLOR3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19511       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLNORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19512       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLNORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19513       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColor4fNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19514       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glColor4fNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19515       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fVertex3fSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FVERTEX3FSUN);
19516       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fVertex3fvSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19517       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord4fVertex4fSUN, GLTEXCOORD4FVERTEX4FSUN);
19518       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord4fVertex4fvSUN, GLTEXCOORD4FVERTEX4FVSUN);
19519       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fColor4ubVertex3fSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FCOLOR4UBVERTEX3FSUN);
19520       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fColor4ubVertex3fvSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FCOLOR4UBVERTEX3FVSUN);
19521       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fColor3fVertex3fSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FCOLOR3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19522       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fColor3fVertex3fvSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FCOLOR3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19523       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19524       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19525       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fColor4fNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19526       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord2fColor4fNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLTEXCOORD2FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19527       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord4fColor4fNormal3fVertex4fSUN, GLTEXCOORD4FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX4FSUN);
19528       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glTexCoord4fColor4fNormal3fVertex4fvSUN, GLTEXCOORD4FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX4FVSUN);
19529       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUIVERTEX3FSUN);
19530       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUIVERTEX3FVSUN);
19531       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiColor4ubVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUICOLOR4UBVERTEX3FSUN);
19532       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiColor4ubVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUICOLOR4UBVERTEX3FVSUN);
19533       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiColor3fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUICOLOR3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19534       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiColor3fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUICOLOR3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19535       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUINORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19536       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUINORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19537       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiColor4fNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUICOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19538       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiColor4fNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUICOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19539       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FVERTEX3FSUN);
19540       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19541       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19542       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19543       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fColor4fNormal3fVertex3fSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FSUN);
19544       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glReplacementCodeuiTexCoord2fColor4fNormal3fVertex3fvSUN, GLREPLACEMENTCODEUITEXCOORD2FCOLOR4FNORMAL3FVERTEX3FVSUN);
19545 
19546       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_SUN_vertex)
19547     }
19548     else
19549     {
19550       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
19551     }
19552   }

20088     CS_WGL_EXT_pixel_format = (strstr (extstrWGL, ext) != 0);
20089

20093     allclear = true;
20094     if (init)
20095     {
20096       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(wglGetPixelFormatAttribivEXT, WGLGETPIXELFORMATATTRIBIVEXT);
20097       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(wglGetPixelFormatAttribfvEXT, WGLGETPIXELFORMATATTRIBFVEXT);
20098       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(wglChoosePixelFormatEXT, WGLCHOOSEPIXELFORMATEXT);
20099 
20100       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("WGL", WGL_EXT_pixel_format)
20101       CS_WGL_EXT_pixel_format &= allclear;
20102     }
20103     else
20104     {

20106     }
20107   }

20580   void InitGL_ARB_shader_objects ()
20581   {
20582     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_shader_objects) return;
20583     if (!extstrGL) return;
20584     tested_CS_GL_ARB_shader_objects = true;
20585     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_shader_objects";
20586

20588     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
20589     
20590     CS_GL_ARB_shader_objects = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
20591 
20592     bool allclear, funcTest;
20593     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
20594     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_shader_objects;
20595     allclear = true;
20596     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
20597     {
20598       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glDeleteObjectARB, GLDELETEOBJECTARB);
20599       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetHandleARB, GLGETHANDLEARB);
20600       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glDetachObjectARB, GLDETACHOBJECTARB);
20601       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCreateShaderObjectARB, GLCREATESHADEROBJECTARB);
20602       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glShaderSourceARB, GLSHADERSOURCEARB);
20603       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCompileShaderARB, GLCOMPILESHADERARB);
20604       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCreateProgramObjectARB, GLCREATEPROGRAMOBJECTARB);
20605       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glAttachObjectARB, GLATTACHOBJECTARB);
20606       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glLinkProgramARB, GLLINKPROGRAMARB);
20607       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUseProgramObjectARB, GLUSEPROGRAMOBJECTARB);
20608       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glValidateProgramARB, GLVALIDATEPROGRAMARB);
20609       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform1fARB, GLUNIFORM1FARB);
20610       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform2fARB, GLUNIFORM2FARB);
20611       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform3fARB, GLUNIFORM3FARB);
20612       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform4fARB, GLUNIFORM4FARB);
20613       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform1iARB, GLUNIFORM1IARB);
20614       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform2iARB, GLUNIFORM2IARB);
20615       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform3iARB, GLUNIFORM3IARB);
20616       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform4iARB, GLUNIFORM4IARB);
20617       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform1fvARB, GLUNIFORM1FVARB);
20618       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform2fvARB, GLUNIFORM2FVARB);
20619       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform3fvARB, GLUNIFORM3FVARB);
20620       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform4fvARB, GLUNIFORM4FVARB);
20621       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform1ivARB, GLUNIFORM1IVARB);
20622       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glUniform2ivARB, GLUNIFORM2IVARB);

20749   void InitGL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object ()
20750   {
20751     if (tested_CS_GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object) return;
20752     if (!extstrGL) return;
20753     tested_CS_GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object = true;
20754     const char* ext = "GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object";
20755     InitGL_ARB_vertex_buffer_object();
20756     if (!CS_GL_ARB_vertex_buffer_object)
20757     {
20758       Report (msgDependencyNotFound, "GL", ext, "GL_ARB_vertex_buffer_object");
20759       return;
20760     }
20761     char cfgkey[26 + 26 + 1];
20762     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
20763     
20764     CS_GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
20765 
20766     bool allclear, funcTest;
20767     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
20768     bool init = CS_GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object;
20769     allclear = true;
20770     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
20771     {
20772 
20773       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_ARB_pixel_buffer_object)
20774     }
20775     else
20776     {
20777       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
20778     }
20779   }

20812   void InitGL_EXT_framebuffer_object ()
20813   {
20814     if (tested_CS_GL_EXT_framebuffer_object) return;
20815     if (!extstrGL) return;
20816     tested_CS_GL_EXT_framebuffer_object = true;
20817     const char* ext = "GL_EXT_framebuffer_object";
20818 
20819     char cfgkey[26 + 25 + 1];
20820     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
20821     
20822     CS_GL_EXT_framebuffer_object = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
20823 
20824     bool allclear, funcTest;
20825     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
20826     bool init = CS_GL_EXT_framebuffer_object;
20827     allclear = true;
20828     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
20829     {
20830       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glIsRenderbufferEXT, GLISRENDERBUFFEREXT);
20831       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBindRenderbufferEXT, GLBINDRENDERBUFFEREXT);
20832       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glDeleteRenderbuffersEXT, GLDELETERENDERBUFFERSEXT);
20833       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGenRenderbuffersEXT, GLGENRENDERBUFFERSEXT);
20834       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glRenderbufferStorageEXT, GLRENDERBUFFERSTORAGEEXT);
20835       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetRenderbufferParameterivEXT, GLGETRENDERBUFFERPARAMETERIVEXT);
20836       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glIsFramebufferEXT, GLISFRAMEBUFFEREXT);
20837       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glBindFramebufferEXT, GLBINDFRAMEBUFFEREXT);
20838       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glDeleteFramebuffersEXT, GLDELETEFRAMEBUFFERSEXT);
20839       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGenFramebuffersEXT, GLGENFRAMEBUFFERSEXT);
20840       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glCheckFramebufferStatusEXT, GLCHECKFRAMEBUFFERSTATUSEXT);
20841       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glFramebufferTexture1DEXT, GLFRAMEBUFFERTEXTURE1DEXT);
20842       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glFramebufferTexture2DEXT, GLFRAMEBUFFERTEXTURE2DEXT);
20843       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glFramebufferTexture3DEXT, GLFRAMEBUFFERTEXTURE3DEXT);
20844       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glFramebufferRenderbufferEXT, GLFRAMEBUFFERRENDERBUFFEREXT);
20845       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGetFramebufferAttachmentParameterivEXT, GLGETFRAMEBUFFERATTACHMENTPARAMETERIVEXT);
20846       EXTMGR_FUNC_INIT(glGenerateMipmapEXT, GLGENERATEMIPMAPEXT);
20847 
20848       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_EXT_framebuffer_object)
20849     }
20850     else
20851     {
20852       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
20853     }
20854   }

20858   void InitGL_EXT_pixel_buffer_object ()
20859   {
20860     if (tested_CS_GL_EXT_pixel_buffer_object) return;
20861     if (!extstrGL) return;
20862     tested_CS_GL_EXT_pixel_buffer_object = true;
20863     const char* ext = "GL_EXT_pixel_buffer_object";
20864     InitGL_ARB_vertex_buffer_object();
20865     if (!CS_GL_ARB_vertex_buffer_object)
20866     {
20867       Report (msgDependencyNotFound, "GL", ext, "GL_ARB_vertex_buffer_object");
20868       return;
20869     }
20870     char cfgkey[26 + 26 + 1];
20871     sprintf (cfgkey, "Video.OpenGL.UseExtension.%s", ext);
20872     
20873     CS_GL_EXT_pixel_buffer_object = (strstr (extstrGL, ext) != 0);
20874 
20875     bool allclear, funcTest;
20876     (void)funcTest; // shut up "variable unused" warnings
20877     bool init = CS_GL_EXT_pixel_buffer_object;
20878     allclear = true;
20879     if (init)   // Don't check the functions if ext isn't reported anyway
20880     {
20881 
20882       EXTMGR_REPORT_INIT_RESULT("GL", GL_EXT_pixel_buffer_object)
20883     }
20884     else
20885     {
20886       Report (msgExtNotFound, "GL", ext);
20887     }
20888   }
